prompts.title: Harvey Wallbanger
prompts.description: Name a cocktail. Everyone guesses an ingredient until someone messes up. Person who messes up, drinks.

prompts.title: Primark
prompts.description: Who ever is wearing the same colour shirt/top, drinks

prompts.title: Big Brother
prompts.description: Tell the group the last thing you searched up. Refusal is a drink.

prompts.title: Disappoint the Sailor
prompts.description: No one curses for a round.

prompts.title: Humilation
prompts.description: What is your most embarrassing thing you've done recently? Drink, you are going to need it

prompts.title: Gym Bro's
prompts.description: Flex and Drink.

prompts.title: Shots, Shots, Shots
prompts.description: Pick someone to take a shot.

prompts.title: 2 Girls, 1 Cup
prompts.description: What is the grossest thing you have done. 3 Drinks if you refuse.

prompts.title: Helen Keller
prompts.description: Hum a song. First to get it, chooses someone to take a drink.

prompts.title: Truth be Told
prompts.description: Say something about yourself. The group guesses if it is true or false. People wrong have to drink.

prompts.title: Walk of Shame
prompts.description: Whats your biggest regret. After, drink up.

prompts.title: Amy Schumer
prompts.description: Tell a joke. If anyone laughs, they take a drink. If no one laughs, you take 3 drinks.

prompts.title: Group Therapy
prompts.description: The group goes around and compliments you. After, take as many drinks as there are people.

prompts.title: Shut up and Dance
prompts.description: Do a dance or take a shot.

prompts.title: Roll Call
prompts.description: Go around naming everyone's full names. If you mess up, you drink.

prompts.title: Clockblocked
prompts.description: What time is it currently? Take as many drinks as the hour hand shows.

prompts.title: Fox Hunting
prompts.description: Everyone has to fancy talk for one round. Mess ups are a drink.

prompts.title: The Great Debate
prompts.description: Pineapples on pizza? Minority drinks.

prompts.title: You Come Here Often?
prompts.description: Use a pickup line on the player before you. If it works, they drink. If not, you drink.
The group goes around revealing their last text. Worst text, drinks.

prompts.title: Happeniss
prompts.description: What's the best thing that happened to you this year?

prompts.title: Glasses Up
prompts.description: Make a toast, everyone drinks.

prompts.title: Most Likely
prompts.description: Play a round of most likely.

prompts.title: Silence Wench!
prompts.description: Stay silent for an entire round.

prompts.title: Thirsty?
prompts.description: We haven't seen a drink touch your lips in a while. Take a shot.

prompts.title: Naughty Naughty
prompts.description: The group comes up with something to send to someone. If you refuse to send, you finish your drink. If you send it, the group finishes their drink.

prompts.title: Piss Baby
prompts.description: Suck your thumb for one round.

prompts.title: Wedding Bells
prompts.description: Passionately tell the person before you, you love them. Cheers to the happy couple, both of you drink.

prompts.title: Why would you say that?
prompts.description: Tell the group your most controversial opinion.

prompts.title: Monster Munch
prompts.description: If you have eaten this game, drink up.

prompts.title: Egg Heads
prompts.description: Ask the player after you a general knowledge question. If they answer correctly, you drink. If not, they drink.

prompts.title: No Hablo Ingl√©s
prompts.description: You cannot speak English for one round.

prompts.title: Mr Worldwide
prompts.description: Speak with an accent for one round.

prompts.title: Twos Company
prompts.description: Choose someone to drink double for one round.

prompts.title: Chug Master
prompts.description: You can yell the word "chug" at any point at the game. Everyone must chug their drink till it's finished. Only to be used once.
